channel.title: Check this game out, my version of Bejeweled!
channel.description:
Alright, this game is now finished 100%, no glitches whatsoever. Works perfectly. The download is below, open source! Compile and run.
[b]Rules: [/b] -Switch items to make a row of three -You can make horizontal, diagonal, and vertical switches. -You can not switch the item unless it makes a match. -100 points per 3 in a row, 200 points for 4-6 in a row. -Beat the timer! -Don't flame me pl0x. -Don't laugh at Sprites
[b]Credits: Mod Taharok [/b]- Suggestions that really improved this game [b].Kaboom[/b] - Found great source for Sprites [url=http://tux.crystalxp.net/en.2.48.html]Tux Artists[/url] - Sprites [b]Me[/b] - Game [b]Everyone else[/b] - Encouragement
[b]Download:[/b] Bejeweled - [url=http://uppit.com/d/D4HRF]UppIT[/url] - [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=CSJGTI3Q]MegaUploadz[/url] Bejeweled w/ quotes - [url=http://uppit.com/d/OOWYL]UppIT[/url] - [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=448LJL9J]MegaUploadz[/url]
[b]Look forward to:[/b] -MySQL Highscores chart - Someone please make for me, as I am looking at tuts about MySQL so I can get enough knowledge to make it myself. -New Version - If I get interested again, I will make a new version with diff look, sprites, rules, bonuses, whatever, and sound and better effects :)
Alright, thank you all for helping, enjoy this game!
PLEASE POST FEEDBACK!!!

item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“pizza pie, post:18, topic:132243”]Rofl, im still going to finish downloading it but guess what… i just made the whole timer in my Game class… my Game class will handle updates, Bejeweled will handle Actions and with another Thread, handle repainting.

alright so far so good. now I need to get better detection of matches… because sometimes it glitches… here comes a addition of like 20 more cases :([/quote]

Break up the Cavnas into tiles and check which tile is selected and then move on from there.

item.description:

[quote=“pizza pie, post:13, topic:132243”]Yeah… I thought about double buffering, but, I don’t have great expirience, I’ll go read some tuts lol, ty

Umm… ty for decompiling rofl

First of all, you should have a main Thread for listeners and a Thread for the animation loop.

You’re a genius, I’ll start on that right now.[br][size=1]Posted on: August 11, 2007, 09:03:52 PM[/size][hr]Rofl, it double buffers now… alright, but now that it updates faster, i need a better timing system :(, its messed up… i tried making the method static but then it just freezes up… i tried making a new thread every time but that only messes it up so tehre are like 3 different times at the same time and when the first level timer runs out it fails…

can you please recommend something

EDIT: sry for double post but this is urgent and no one else is talking so i thought it is okay[/quote]

http://www.megashare.com/251708

In chapter 2, it explains the animation timer.

PS: Moparisthebest, the #moparscape channel is in need of you.

item.title: Check this game out, my version of Bejeweled!
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

After decompiling, I have two suggestions:

First of all, you should have a main Thread for listeners and a Thread for the animation loop.

Secondly, you should put all game updating in a separate method and not handle it during painting. On top of that, you should also double buffer your painting.

I can tell you put a load of effort in it. Great work.

Read full topic

item.source: Check this game out, my version of Bejeweled!

item.title: Check this game out, my version of Bejeweled!
item.dc:creator: @pplsuqbawlz pplsuqbawlz
item.description:
@pplsuqbawlz wrote:

[quote=“pizza pie, post:1, topic:132243”]Alright, I am creating a Bejeweled game. The progress is about 90% done. I won’t release it just yet. Yes it will be open source, but only after I add the comments because I did not do that on the way. After I add the comments, I will release the second version which will be open source.

Alright, here is the latest pic:


This will be updated every time I change the graphics.

So, this is just a game of Bejeweled, 3 in a row is 100 points 4-6 in a row is 200 points. Only can get points if the line is horizontal or diagonal. Also, there is a timer and amount of points needed per level.

So, this is the important part:
[size=14pt]I need to get suggestions.
-Sprites: Find me better sprites, 66x51, I’ll be looking too.
-Improvements: Ways to improve game performance, or just the amount of fun it is…
-Other: Any thing else you think I should add…
[/size]

Alright thanks to anyone that helps

BTW, I’m looking for sprites too.

Sprites:
-pizza: found
-cell phone: drawn
-pie: not found
-laptop: not found
-gun: not found

Update:
-Fail message
-Select icon
-sprites[/quote]
AHHHHHHHH I AM GONNA HAVE A SEIZURE.

Read full topic
